Name: Flask of Saint Minas with Handle
Description: The flask, or bottle, has a narrow mouth and a narrow cylindrical neck. On either side of the body of the bottle, Saint Minas is shown in prayer. He wears a cloak and two camels kneel at his feet.There are two crosses around his head in the upper part of the scene. The whole scene is surrounded by a circle made of dots that are outlined between two ridges. A handle on each side begins at the middle of the neck and ends on the upper part of the body.
